Detailed Description

Sequence of autogenerating unique IDs.

Definition at line 235 of file bdb.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bdb::sequence::sequence ( database *  db,
const char *  name,
bool  create = false 
) [protected]

Opens the sequence.

If "create" is "true" and sequence doesn't exist, then creates it.

Exceptions:
bdb::exception BDB_ERROR_NOT_FOUND - the sequence is not found.
bdb::exception BDB_ERROR_EXISTS - the sequence already exists.
bdb::exception BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN - unknown error.
Parameters:
[in] db Database of the sequence.
[in] name Name of the sequence.
[in] create Whether to create the sequence if it doesn't exist.
